A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A long time ago in a galaxy far far away\, a really shitty script\, was executed in a really horrible way. This film just continues the creation of crap aimed at selling toys for a young generation\, in an otherwise rich universe. Absolute garbage\, with every imaginable cliche in the series\, and some really dumb villains. The over-emphasis on emotional issues really kills me inside - it's just so bad. And the new characters? Annoying and forgettable. You get 1 star for the cool computer graphics as usual. Long story short\, this movie feels like it was written by a child\, for children.
